main event: A round, reddish object was observed descending in Swansea, Illinois in November 1957.
interesting points: The object was the size of a baseball at arm's length,The object emitted a distinct spark during its flight,It was visually observed for 5 seconds before burning out,The sighting was attributed to a meteor,The observer was a Supervisory General Engineer at Scott Air Force Base.
witness description: Mr. [REDACTED], Supervisory General Engineer at Scott Air Force Base
